# @opensourceframework/next-seo - AI Summary

## Package Overview
- **Package:** @opensourceframework/next-seo
- **Version:** v7.3.5
- **Forked from:** next-seo (original: grevory/next-seo)
- **Purpose:** SEO plugin for Next.js with comprehensive structured data support

## Key Capabilities

### JSON-LD Components
- ArticleJsonLd
- BreadcrumbJsonLd
- CourseJsonLd
- ProductJsonLd
- OrganizationJsonLd
- LocalBusinessJsonLd
- VideoGameJsonLd
- JobPostingJsonLd
- And 30+ more components

### SEO Components
- NextSeo component for default meta tags
- Open Graph tags
- Twitter card tags
- Canonical URLs
- Robots meta directives

### Framework Support
- Pages Router
- App Router
- Server Components

## Modernization Updates
- 539+ unit tests
- Full TypeScript rewrite
- Optimized for Next.js 15+
- tsup-based ESM/CJS build
- No @type required pattern (intelligent defaults)

## Installation
```bash
npm install @opensourceframework/next-seo
# or
pnpm add @opensourceframework/next-seo
```

## Migration from Original
Replace `next-seo` with `@opensourceframework/next-seo` in your dependencies.
Import paths remain the same.

## Use Cases
- Enhanced JSON-LD management beyond Next.js Metadata API
- Structured data for rich search results
- Social media previews (OG tags)
- Comprehensive SEO for Next.js apps
